    <descript>
      <abstract>This polygon dataset represents 2005 buildings on the Fairfax campus, George Mason University, VA</abstract>
      <purpose>The data is intended for researchers, students and others for reference and mapping purposes.  It may be used for any analysis related to campus incidents and for tracing changes of campus layouts through time. </purpose>
    </descript>
